def priority(item: float, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """Returns priority with which we want to add item to each bin.

    Args:
        item: Size of item to be added to the bin.
        bins: Array of capacities for each bin.

    Return:
        Array of same size as bins with priority score of each bin.
    """
    priorities = np.zeros_like(bins)
    
    max_bin_capacity = np.max(bins)  # Find the maximum capacity among all bins
    
    for i in range(len(bins)):
        remaining_capacity = bins[i] - item
        
        if bins[i] >= item:
            priorities[i] = 0
        elif remaining_capacity > max_bin_capacity / 2:
            priorities[i] = 1 / remaining_capacity
        elif remaining_capacity > 0:
            priorities[i] = 2 / remaining_capacity  # Weighting based on remaining capacity
        else:
            priorities[i] = np.inf
    
    return priorities
